animeTitle: Kinyoru, Abe Reiji: Heikinteki na Salaryman no Ijou na Nichijou
animeDescription: Five three-minute episodes will air in a month. The anime will have segments about the state of salarymen throughout Japan, such as how many eat bread or rice for breakfast.(Source: ANN)
